questions.question: For a set X={1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8} and its permutation Y={4,2,1,3,6,5,8,7}, which is the longest cyclic permutation in Y?

explanations.a: 2 is not part of the same cycle as 1,3 and 4
explanations.c: cycle containing 7 and 8 is of length two which is smaller than length three cycle of 1,3 and 4

questions.question: For a set X={1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8} and its permutation Y={4,2,1,3,6,5,8,7}, Y is an odd permutation.

explanations.a: parity of a permutation is the sum of length of all cyclic permutations subtracted by the number of cyclic permutations, for any permutation of a set.

questions.question: For a set X={1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8} and its permutation Y={4,2,1,3,6,5,8,7}, order of the permutation is

explanations.b: order of the permutation is the LCM of the lengths of all cyclic permutations present in that permutation.
